description: Finnian, often called Finny, is the Phantomhive household gardener. However, it seems every time he tends to the garden, it is killed through an accident caused by his clumsiness and overenthusiastic pruning or not noticing that the pesticide container is leaking. In fact, if left to his own devices, he`s stated that he`d like to make the garden into the shape of a giant robot.
name: Finnian
